00025 /*
00026  * This file must be included with wxUSE_GUI defined to zero or one.
00027  * Usually on console applications, this will be taken care of in
00028  * configure time. This is because wx classes will be compiled 
00029  * differently in each case.
00030  * 
00031  */

00033 #ifndef __EXTERNALCONNECTOR_H__
00034 #define __EXTERNALCONNECTOR_H__

00036 #include <wx/app.h>         // For wxApp
00037 #include <wx/cmdline.h>     // For wxCmdLineEntryDesc
00038 #include <ec/cpp/RemoteConnect.h>

00040 #include <wx/intl.h>
00041 
00042 #define CMD_DEPRECATED      0x1000
00043 #define CMD_OK           0
00044 #define CMD_ID_QUIT     -1
00045 #define CMD_ID_HELP     -2
00046 #define CMD_ERR_SYNTAX      -3
00047 #define CMD_ERR_PROCESS_CMD -4
00048 #define CMD_ERR_NO_PARAM    -5
00049 #define CMD_ERR_MUST_HAVE_PARAM -6
00050 #define CMD_ERR_INVALID_ARG -7
00051 #define CMD_ERR_INCOMPLETE  -8
00052 
00053 enum Params {
00054     CMD_PARAM_NEVER,
00055     CMD_PARAM_OPTIONAL,
00056     CMD_PARAM_ALWAYS
00057 };
00058 
00059 class CCommandTree;
00060 
00061 typedef std::list<const CCommandTree*>  CmdList_t;
00062 typedef std::list<const CCommandTree*>::iterator    CmdPos_t;
00063 typedef std::list<const CCommandTree*>::const_iterator  CmdPosConst_t;
00064 
00065 class CaMuleExternalConnector;
00066 
00067 class CCommandTree {
00068  public:
00069     CCommandTree(CaMuleExternalConnector& app)
00070         : m_command(wxEmptyString), m_cmd_id(CMD_ERR_SYNTAX), m_short(wxEmptyString), m_verbose(wxEmptyString), m_params(CMD_PARAM_OPTIONAL), m_parent(NULL), m_app(app)
00071         {}
00072 
00073     ~CCommandTree();
00074 
00075     CCommandTree*   AddCommand(const wxString& command, int cmd_id, const wxString& shortDesc, const wxString& longDesc, enum Params params = CMD_PARAM_OPTIONAL)
00076         {
00077             return AddCommand(new CCommandTree(m_app, command, cmd_id, shortDesc, longDesc, params));
00078         }
00079 
00080     int FindCommandId(const wxString& command, wxString& args, wxString& cmdstr) const;
00081     wxString GetFullCommand() const;
00082     void    PrintHelpFor(const wxString& command) const;
00083 
00084  private:
00085     CCommandTree(CaMuleExternalConnector& app, const wxString& command, int cmd_id, const wxString& shortDesc, const wxString& longDesc, enum Params params)
00086         : m_command(command), m_cmd_id(cmd_id), m_short(shortDesc), m_verbose(longDesc), m_params(params), m_parent(NULL), m_app(app)
00087         {}
00088 
00089     CCommandTree*   AddCommand(CCommandTree* cmdTree);
00090 
00091     wxString    m_command;
00092     int     m_cmd_id;
00093     wxString    m_short;
00094     wxString    m_verbose;
00095     enum Params m_params;
00096     const CCommandTree* m_parent;
00097     CaMuleExternalConnector& m_app;
00098     CmdList_t   m_subcommands;
00099 };

00104 class CaMuleExternalConnector : public wxApp
00105 {
00106 public:
00107     //
00108     // Constructor & Destructor
00109     // 
00110     CaMuleExternalConnector();

00112 
00113     //
00114     // Virtual functions
00115     //
00116     virtual void Pre_Shell() {}
00117     virtual void Post_Shell() {}
00118     virtual int ProcessCommand(int) { return -1; }
00119     virtual void TextShell(const wxString &prompt);
00120     virtual void LoadConfigFile();
00121     virtual void SaveConfigFile();
00122     virtual void LoadAmuleConfig(CECFileConfig& cfg);
00123     virtual void OnInitCommandSet();

00125     virtual const wxString GetGreetingTitle() = 0;
00126 
00127     //
00128     // Other functions
00129     // 
00130     void Show(const wxString &s);
00131     void DebugShow(const wxString &s) { if (m_Verbose) Show(s); }
00132     const wxString& GetCmdArgs() const { return m_cmdargs; }
00133     const wxString& GetLastCmdStr() const { return m_lastcmdstr; }
00134     int GetIDFromString(const wxString& buffer) { return m_commands.FindCommandId(buffer, m_cmdargs, m_lastcmdstr); }
00135     void Process_Answer(const wxString& answer);
00136     bool Parse_Command(const wxString& buffer);
00137     void GetCommand(const wxString &prompt, char* buffer, size_t buffer_size);
00138     const CECPacket *SendRecvMsg_v2(const CECPacket *request) { return m_ECClient->SendRecvPacket(request); }
00139     void SendPacket(const CECPacket *request) { m_ECClient->SendPacket(request); }
00140     void ConnectAndRun(const wxString &ProgName, const wxString& ProgVersion);
00141     void ShowGreet();
00142 
00143     //
00144     // Command line processing
00145     // 
00146     void OnInitCmdLine(wxCmdLineParser& amuleweb_parser, const char* appname);
00147     bool OnCmdLineParsed(wxCmdLineParser& parser);
00148 
00149 #if wxUSE_ON_FATAL_EXCEPTION
00150     // Exception and assert handling
00151     void OnFatalException();
00152 #endif
00153 #ifdef __WXDEBUG__
00154     void OnAssertFailure(const wxChar *file, int line, const wxChar *func, const wxChar *cond, const wxChar *msg);
00155 #endif
00156 
00157     CECFileConfig*  m_configFile;
00158     wxString    m_configFileName;
00159 
00160 protected:
00161     // Set current locale, if language is not empty.
00162     // returns canonical name of set (current) locale
00163     virtual wxString SetLocale(const wxString& language);
00164 
00165     long        m_port;
00166     wxString    m_host;
00167     CMD4Hash    m_password;
00168     bool        m_ZLIB;
00169     bool        m_KeepQuiet;
00170     bool        m_Verbose;
00171     bool        m_interactive;
00172     CCommandTree    m_commands;
00173     const char *    m_appname;
00174 
00175 #if !wxUSE_GUI && defined(__WXMAC__) && !wxCHECK_VERSION(2, 9, 0)
00176     virtual wxAppTraits* CreateTraits();
00177 #endif
00178 
00179 private:
